resources.string: Go to <font color=\'#33B5E5\'>%1$s</font> and sign in. Then enter this code:
Use voice to make the most of your drive. Alexa can help with directions, music, calls, and much more.
You can still ask Alexa for weather and address navigation. For music, nearby restaurants and more, sign in.
There was an issue enabling Preview mode. Please try again.
Alexa needs access to the internet to complete setup. \n Please check your network connection and try again.
Sign in to your Amazon account
Alexa is not supported in the %1$s.
Alexa in-vehicle experience is currently not supported in your region.
There was an issue setting up Alexa. Please try again.
There was an issue setting up. Please try again.
There was an issue signing in. Please try again.
Share your vehicle\'s current location with Alexa to get smarter responses for nearby restaurants, local weather and more.
Share your vehicle\'s current location with [Brandon] and Alexa to get smarter responses for nearby restaurants, local weather and more.
Alexa can help you navigate to the favorite locations stored in your vehicle. Favorites will be uploaded to the Amazon service.
Set Alexa as your default assistant
To use Alexa, you need to set Alexa as the default Assist app. This will replace your current assistant.
To use Alexa, you need to set Alexa as the default Assist app in Settings. \n Tap Settings below, then select Assist App, Alexa.
To set up Alexa, the vehicle must be parked.
Go to <font color=\'#0000FF\'>%1$s</font> and sign in.\n Then enter this code:
Go to %1$s and sign in. Then enter this code: %2$s
OR scan the QR code below.
This allows you to access Alexa by tapping the Voice button on your steering wheel. This will replace your default assistant.
